002.text: The people of the universe have spread through the galaxies, exploring further and further...

003.text: The exploration outposts are far-away planets and remote satellites, where the residents live isolated from the Inter-Galaxy services...

004.text: In these harsh conditions, any medical emergency can be deadly if no medical care is given.

005.text: But the people at the edges of the known universe can always count on the Star Paramedics, a group of professionals who drive the injured to the nearest hospital...

007.text: Coincidentalliy, our heroes have just begun their career as Star Paramedics…

008.name: Bang
008.text: Oh dear ! I'm so scared I have a tummy-ache ! Don't you, Big ?

010.name: Bang
010.text: At least we got paired together. I feel better with you here !

011.name: Bang
011.text: Still a chatterbox, are you ? No big deal, I'll take care of the patients, you can drive the ambulance...

012.name: Bang
012.text: Still, how exciting ! Saving distressed people while exploring the galaxy !

013.name: Bang
013.text: It's my childhood dream, and now it's for real !

015.name: Bang
015.text: Yeah, I know you feel the same !

018.name: Bang
018.text: Aaaaaaaaahhh !! Look at the GPS coordinates !! We are the only ambulance around here, we've got to take it !!

020.name: Bang
020.text: No more simulations, it's for realsies, let's gooo !
